casebody.data:
APONAUG MANUFACTURING COMPANY et al., Appellants, v. Eugene FLY, Individually and as Collector of Internal Revenue, Appellee. No. 8392. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 6, 1937.

Before FOSTER, SIBLEY, and HOLMES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered by the court that the motion, filed by appellants for an injunction pending the appeal in the above entitled and numbered cause be, and the same is hereby, denied.
